SEARCH
Module java.base
Package jdk.internal.classfile

Interface AnnotationElement

All Superinterfaces:
ClassfileElement, WritableElement<AnnotationElement>
public sealed interface AnnotationElement extends WritableElement<AnnotationElement>
Models a key-value pair of an annotation.
See Also:
  • Annotation
  • AnnotationValue
